revised_title: Edge Waves on a Sloping Beach: A Study of Resonance and Spectra
tldr: This article discusses the theory of edge waves on a sloping beach and how resonance occurs at specific frequencies in the motion of a fluid. The author explores the spectrum of eigenfrequencies and how viscosity affects the motion near cut-off frequencies. The study of edge waves can help understand beach phenomena and the behavior of waves in the ocean.
